messages.message:
• for the first issue, what does `/billing-plan` return for you? see https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C05L87V014J/p1751478645656059?thread_ts=1751461468.685639&cid=C05L87V014J
• it seems Matt is currently investigating (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C05L87V014J/p1751973787816209?thread_ts=1751944994.738119&cid=C05L87V014J) the `weaviate-titan` issue
ah yepp, after reverting the mentioned weaviate-titan PR this morning, weaviate-titan is now up, let me get the other service stragglers up to look at `/billing-plan`

Alrighty, yep resolved weaviate-titan by reverting a couple offending PRs! As for billing, the response for me is also `404` `Plan expired for customer`. I've gone into `apps/aihub-admin/` to go back and forth downgrading my org to commercial, then back to enterprise, and I'm seeing `upgrading ... requires manual set up in Metronome`, in which is could I get help manually setting up my account, @Paul H is that what you had to do here (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C05L87V014J/p1751481203102979?thread_ts=1751461468.685639&cid=C05L87V014J)?
I actually created a brand new user + enterprise org in that particular case. Similar to you, downgrading + upgrading an org did not resolve the issue
Understoood, alrighty my new user and org has resolved the issue, thanks :pray:

glad that you're unblocked! @pauline.comising

@Victor Zeng it seems your PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/71928) fixes the issue with creating new orgs, but do you know why the existing org can no longer be used? is this expected behavior?
